function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"No relation between costs of compliance and compliant behavior","Impact":"Ineffective compliance with measures","Mitigation":"Increase awareness of the importance of compliance, provide incentives for compliance","Technologies":"Communication tools, behavioral incentives","People":"General population, compliance enforcers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"No relation between negative emotions and compliance","Impact":"Potential disregard for emotional well-being in compliance strategies","Mitigation":"Address emotional well-being through support systems and mental health resources","Technologies":"Telehealth, mental health apps","People":"General population, mental health professionals","Owner":"Public health authorities, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"No relation for severity of deterrence with compliance","Impact":"Weak deterrence effect of measures","Mitigation":"Increase the certainty of punishment, enhance detection capabilities","Technologies":"Surveillance technology, monitoring systems","People":"General population, law enforcement","Owner":"Government, law enforcement agencies"}]}
